charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was acting as
Miriam’s guide, since she recently arrived
on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_0200:
Thanks for showing me around today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_0300: It was fun sightseeing across the island!
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_0400:
Toxapex seems happy to be at the
beach, too!
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1101_0500:
As Miriam said, Toxapex seemed to be
enjoying herself.
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1101_0600:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] approached
and tried to pet her...
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_0800: Ah... Sorry if I startled you.
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_0900:
It’s just...if Toxapex’s toxic spikes pricked
you, it’d be SUPER painful.
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_1000:
Some people even suffer post-recovery
aftereffects, so...
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_1200:
I should’ve warned you ahead of time.
I’ll be better about that in the future.
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_0401_1400: Ahahaha! That makes me feel a little better.
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_0402_1600:
Thanks! As you can see, I still have a long
way to go before I’m a true professional.
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_1700:
Toxapex is my partner Pokémon, so I’ve
studied all about her...
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_1800:
And for the health teacher certification exam,
I had to cram even more.
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_1900:
That said, everything I’ve learned will be
useless if I don’t use it when it counts!
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_2000:
If I want to keep my students safe, I should
set a better example!
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_2100:
I should really watch other teachers to learn
how to improve.
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_2200:
Plus, lots of teachers in Paldea are also
good at battling, so maybe I should work
on that, too!
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_2300: Am I greedy, wanting to be good at both?
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_2500:
I guess it’s OK to be ambitious as long as I
don’t inconvenience others!
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_2600:
OK! I’ll keep improving—together with
Toxapex...
charaepi_ch0336_00_mimoza/2301_1201_2700:
and show all these Pasio sync pairs a
heavenly battle!
